curam.util.exception

Class DatabaseException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • curam.util.exception.AppRuntimeException
            • curam.util.exception.DatabaseException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DuplicateRecordException, MultipleRecordException, OtherDatabaseException, OverflowException, RecordChangedException, RecordDeletedException, RecordLockedException, RecordNotFoundException

    public class DatabaseException
extends AppRuntimeException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code. You do not normally instantiate this exception yourself. Subclasses of this exception (such as RecordNotFoundException, DuplicateRecordException, etc.) may be thrown by data access routines and handled by application code. If such an exception is not handled `Curam's` last-chance handlers will log the exception along with meta data describing the data access that caused it to occur.
    See Also:
    AppRuntimeException, Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeLog()
      Trace the details of the exception (its stack trace) and the situation in which it occurred (details associated with the data access operation which triggered it).
      void writeLog(boolean disableLogDetail)
      Trace a database exception and optionally log details about it.

    • Method Detail

      • writeLog

        public void writeLog()
        Trace the details of the exception (its stack trace) and the situation in which it occurred (details associated with the data access operation which triggered it).

      • writeLog

        public void writeLog(boolean disableLogDetail)
        Trace a database exception and optionally log details about it. Depending on the type of exception that might include its stack trace and the situation in which it occurred (e.g. the data associated with it).
        Parameters:
        disableLogDetail - Suppress logging of detail information.
